**The Supreme Cavern Divine Rite of Dao-Walking for Ordination and Empowerment**

**Title:** *The Supreme Cavern Divine Rite of Dao-Walking for Ordination and Empowerment*
**Author:** Unknown, approximately dated to the Northern and Southern Dynasties period. Compiled as a collection of five *Cavern Divine* and *Three Sovereigns* fast rituals. One fascicle.
**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Orthodox Tradition*, Section Zhengyi, Part One.

---

### **The Rite of Evening Petition (宿启法)**
Face north, bow twice, and kneel. Strike the teeth thirty-six times.

The humble Daoist adept, the minor servant [Name], respectfully petitions the Most High Dao Lord of the Nine Heavens, the Supreme Elder, the Great Gods of the Nine Elders’ Immortal Capital, the Nine Qi Elders, the True Lords of the Three Sovereigns, the Venerable Lords of the Eight Emperors, the Immortal Officials of the Mysterious Capital, the Supreme Mysterious True Spirits, the Divine Lords of the Thirty-Six Heavenly Offices, the Lords of the Seven Stars of the Jade Armillary Sphere and the Radiant Light, the Celestial Worthies of the Three Terraces and the Purple Palace of the Northern Pole, the Lords of Heavenly Unity and Supreme Unity, the Mysterious Spirits of the Supreme Subtlety and the Canopy of Flowering Brilliance, the Divine Officials within and beyond the Twenty-Eight Constellations, the Spirits of the Five Peaks, Eight Mountains, Four Waterways, Nine Springs, Cavern Heavens, Sunlit Terraces, Divine Continent, Thunderous Waters, Great Marshes, the Inner Palaces of the Queen of Heaven, the Nine Heavens, Nine Earths, and the Boundless Worlds—all myriad spirits.

Now, in the course of this reverent ritual, I humbly present this evening petition. May all the spirits deign to witness, descend, and safeguard this rite. May they dispel calamities and bestow blessings.

With utmost purity and self-discipline, I await the advent of the numinous and august perfected ones. I repent and seek absolution for the transgressions and malevolent karmic roots of my nine generations of ancestors, praying for their remission and liberation from retribution. May the Three Officials report to the Northern Emperor, erase my name from the Scarlet Register, transcend my tribulations, and secure peace. May I bear the boundless blessings of the primordial and receive the grace of the Emperor.

Upon completion, kowtow thirty-nine times, then bow twice again.

---

### **The Rite of Merit Report (言功法)**
Face north, bow twice, kneel, and strike the teeth six times.

The humble Daoist adept, the minor servant [Name], respectfully petitions the Most High Dao Lord of the Nine Heavens, the Supreme Elder, the Great Gods of the Nine Elders’ Immortal Capital, the Nine Qi Elders, the True Lords of the Three Sovereigns, the Venerable Lords of the Eight Emperors, the Immortal Officials of the Mysterious Capital, the Supreme Mysterious True Spirits, the Divine Lords of the Thirty-Six Heavenly Offices, the Lords of the Seven Stars of the Jade Armillary Sphere and the Radiant Light, the Celestial Worthies of the Three Terraces and the Purple Palace of the Northern Pole, the Lords of Heavenly Unity and Supreme Unity, the Mysterious Spirits of the Supreme Subtlety and the Canopy of Flowering Brilliance, the Divine Officials within and beyond the Twenty-Eight Constellations, the Spirits of the Five Peaks, Eight Mountains, Four Waterways, Nine Springs, Cavern Heavens, Sunlit Terraces, Divine Continent, Thunderous Waters, Great Marshes, the Inner Palaces of the Queen of Heaven, the Nine Heavens, Nine Earths, and the Boundless Worlds—all myriad hosts.

On behalf of [Name] for the matter of [specific purpose], I have conducted this rite of Dao-walking. May the assembled spirits deign to witness this fast, oversee the labor of this rite, and now that the affairs are concluded, return to your palaces to receive rewards according to your merits.

In the course of this reverent ritual, I humbly present this farewell petition. With utmost purity and self-discipline, I await the advent of the numinous and august perfected ones. I repent and seek absolution for the transgressions and malevolent karmic roots of my nine generations of ancestors, praying for their remission and liberation from retribution. May the Three Officials report to the Northern Emperor, erase my name from the Scarlet Register, transcend my tribulations, and secure peace. May I bear the boundless blessings of the primordial and receive the grace of the Emperor.

Upon completion, kowtow thirty-nine times, then bow twice again.

---

### **Incense Offering**
Next, burn incense, strike the teeth twenty-four times, and recite the incantation:
*"Maiden of the incense smoke, ascend and report to the August Lord. The humble Daoist adept [Name], purified in fast and free of worldly dust, awaits the numinous union of the Five Perfections. May my highest aspirations be fulfilled, calamities extinguished, blessings born, and may I ascend with the Three Perfected."*

Then chant the *"Yang Song"* once, circumambulate once, and depart.

*"The pure tones of the Yang Song resound,
Drifting and stirring the ten directions."*

The verdant myriad blossoms shine bright,
Bearing me aloft to the ninefold heavens.
The western lute’s resonant melody,
Moves the Lord of the East to enlightenment.

**Ritual of the Cavernous Dao**
Face north, circumambulate once while burning incense, strike the teeth twenty-four times, and recite the incantation:
*"Maiden of the incense smoke, ascend and report to the August Lord. The humble Daoist adept [Name], for [specific matter], purified in fast and free of worldly dust, awaits the numinous union of the Five Perfections. May my highest aspirations be fulfilled, calamities extinguished, blessings born, and may I ascend with the Three Heavens."*

Face the Heavenly August One to the north, bow twice in prostration, and kneel.
The humble Daoist adept, your servant [Name], respectfully petitions:
*To the Primordial Three Mysteries of the Void Heaven, the Celestial Stem Jiazi, the Founding Heavenly August Lord of the Supreme Origin; to the Great Vastness of the Congealed Yin Heaven—*
For [specific matter], I have bathed in purity and cleansed myself, invoking the perfected and descending the numinous. May the Emperor’s body be robust and the realm at peace; may my own person receive boundless fortune, and may the seven generations of my ancestors be freed from transgressions and karmic entanglements.
I beseech the August Lord to deign to witness this, to cast your divine gaze below, and to scrutinize my sincere heart.
Kowtow thirty-nine times, then bow twice again.

Next, face the Earthly August One to the southwest, bow twice in prostration, and kneel.
The humble Daoist adept, your servant [Name], respectfully petitions:
*To the Three Primordials of the Pure Void Jade Heaven, the Celestial Stem Gengshen, the Founding Earthly August Lord; to the Southern Harmony of the Three Supreme Flourishing—*
For [specific matter], I have bathed in purity and cleansed myself, invoking the perfected and descending the numinous. May the Emperor’s body be robust and the realm at peace; may my own person receive boundless fortune, and may the seven generations of my ancestors be freed from transgressions and karmic entanglements.
I beseech the August Lord to deign to witness this, to cast your divine gaze below, and to scrutinize my sincere heart.
Kowtow thirty-nine times, then bow twice again.

Next, face the Human August One to the northeast, bow twice in prostration, and kneel.
The humble Daoist adept, your servant [Name], respectfully petitions:
*To the Seven Subtleties of the Vast Expansive Void Heaven, the Celestial Stem Jiayin, the Founding Human August Lord; to the Supreme Flourishing of the Southern Vermilion—*
For [specific matter], I have bathed in purity and cleansed myself, invoking the perfected and descending the numinous. May the Emperor’s body be robust and the realm at peace; may my own person receive boundless fortune, and may the seven generations of my ancestors be freed from transgressions and karmic entanglements.
I beseech the August Lord to deign to witness this, to cast your divine gaze below, and to scrutinize my sincere heart.
Kowtow thirty-nine times, then bow twice again.

Face the nine heavens of the north and bow nine times,
Face the nine heavens of the west and bow nine times,
Face the nine heavens of the south and bow nine times,
Face the nine heavens of the east and bow nine times.

Next, chant the *"Yang Song"* nine times and circumambulate thrice.
The pure tones of the Yang Song resound,
Drifting and stirring the ten directions.

The verdant myriad blossoms shine bright,
Bearing me aloft to the ninefold heavens.
The western lute’s resonant melody,
Moves the Lord of the East to enlightenment.
The primal cavern heralds the dawn’s inception,
As the first yang sprouts myriad buds.
The harmonious breeze sways the jade branches,
The towering forests gleam with cloudlike veils.
Gou Mang urges the farmers to toil,
As sun and moon illuminate the eastern expanse.
The immortals and sages wander the Mystic Gardens,
Where soaring hymns arise like clarion calls.
They rein in their radiance within the chambers of rosy clouds,
Aligning their wheels at the nine heavens’ courts.
The host of immortals raise their soaring hymns,
As the Yang Song resounds in due season.
Were one not of the myriad enlightened,
How could they partake in this sacred rite?

The gracious harmony of yin and yang’s song,
The two modes receive the half-light’s glow.
Dwelling in repose, I aspire to soar as an immortal,
Unmoved by the world’s fleeting allure.
Before I realize the vastness of the void,
I have already transcended to the loftiest mysteries.
I sigh for those who rush in vain pursuit,
Unknowing of the root that nurtures life.
As the flourishing yang burgeons in fullness,
I chant the verses of the southern golden beam.
The melting breeze brushes the forest’s edge,
As the vermilion phoenix leads the way in flight.
The clarion hymns rise through the void,
Freely intoning the ninefold harmonies.
I harness my carriage to the pristine forest’s splendor,
Commanding the rhythm to strike the golden bell.
The phoenix’s song harmonizes the eight tones,
As the true effulgence graces the sovereign’s countenance.
Above the immortal chambers, the Yang Song soars,
With soaring flutes and pipes in accompaniment.
I resonate with my own self,
Who can fathom this profound accord?
Roaming the peaks of Mount Song,
I playfully frolic among the towering pines.
The lofty immortals, serene and graceful,
Chant the Yang Song in unison.
In perfect harmony, the nine strings resound,
Their cessation blending with the wondrous tones.
The luminous lamp extends the long night,
As the mysterious radiance illumines the secluded hall.
The soaring hymns rise beyond the phoenix grove,
As the pure breeze brushes the jade pendants.
The Yang Song interweaves in antiphonal chant,
The four casements gleam with crimson light.
Row upon row in the vast Moon Palace,
The distant and boundless chambers of the immortals.
The Dark and Mysterious One chants the Yang Song,
As the eight luminaries emerge through the clouds.
The threads of bathing merge with the yang essence,
As the long hymn extols the Supreme One.
Were one not of steadfast and virtuous intent,
How could they delight in such distant transcendence?

Face north, bow twice in prostration, and kneel. Strike the teeth thirty-six times.
The humble Daoist adept, your servant [Name], respectfully petitions:
*To the Supreme Dao Lord of the Nine Heavens, the Supreme Elder, the Great Gods of the Nine Elders’ Immortal Capital, the Nine Qi Elder, the Primordial Three Mysteries of the Void Heaven, the Celestial Stem Jiazi, the Founding Heavenly August Lord; to the Three Primordials of the Pure Void Jade Heaven, the Celestial Stem Gengshen, the Founding Earthly August Lord; to the Seven Subtleties of the Vast Expansive Void Heaven, the Celestial Stem Jiayin, the Founding Human August Lord; to the Eight August Lords, the Perfected Gods of the Mystic Capital, the Divine Officials of the Thirty-Six Heavenly Administrations, the Lords of the Seven Stars of the Jade Celestial Pivot, the Purple Palace of the Three Terraces and the Supreme Ultimate Heavenly Honored One, the Heavenly One and Supreme One Lords, the Mystic Canopy of the Supreme Radiance, the Divine Spirits of the Twenty-Eight Lunar Mansions, the Gods of the Five Peaks, Eight Mountains, Four Waterways, Nine Springs, Grotto-Heavens, Sunlit Terraces, Divine Continent Immortal Palaces, the Great Marshes and Lakes, the Inner Palaces of the Queen of Heaven, and all the gods of the nine heavens, nine earths, and boundless worlds—*
For [specific matter], I have purified myself in fast and cleansed my being, awaiting the numinous perfected. I repent and confess my transgressions, beseeching forgiveness for the evil roots and karmic entanglements of my nine generations of ancestors. May the Three Officials report to the Northern Emperor, erase my name from the red tablets, transcend my tribulations, and secure peace. May I bear the boundless blessings of the primordial and receive the grace of the Emperor.
Upon completion, kowtow thirty-nine times, then bow twice again.

Next, burn incense, strike the teeth twenty-four times, and recite the incantation:
*"Maiden of the incense smoke, ascend and report to the August Lord. The humble Daoist adept [Name], purified in fast and free of worldly dust, awaits the numinous union of the Five Perfections. May my highest aspirations be fulfilled, calamities extinguished, blessings born, and may I ascend with the Three Heavens."*

Next, sing the Yang Song once through. As it resounds, it circles forth—
The pure horn’s Yang Song, drifting and stirring the ten directions.
A myriad verdant blossoms gleam, bearing me to the ninefold heavens.
The western lute’s lofty tones attune, moving the Eastern King of Lords.
*Ritual for the Offering to the Three Sovereigns of the Cavernous Dao*
Compiled from the scriptures as essential practice, prepared for fellow cultivators to perform together.

First, arrange the seating at the *zi*, *shen*, and *you* positions. Set out incense, kindle lamps, prepare the table, hang the dragon-brocade banner, and arrange the three trays and nine cups for the adept’s life-destiny, along with wine, dried meats, fruits, and cakes, all placed according to ritual.

If a lord or noble seeks blessings for grave matters, follow the scriptural precepts strictly. For commoners or those of modest means, adjust according to their circumstances, but devote heart and effort wholeheartedly to ensure utmost sincerity.

Upon entering, circumambulate once while burning incense, then face north and strike the teeth twenty-four times, reciting the incantation:
*"Maiden of the incense smoke, ascend and report to the August Lord. The humble Daoist adept [Name], purified in fast and free of worldly dust, awaits the numinous union of the Five Perfections. May my highest aspirations be fulfilled, calamities extinguished, blessings born, and may I ascend with the Three Heavens."*

Face the Northern Heavenly Sovereign, bow twice, and kneel.
*"The humble adept, the minor perfected [Name], now bathed and purified, summons the true and invokes the numinous. With this modest offering, I reverently invite the Primordial Three Mysteries of the Void-Heaven, the Celestial Stem Jia-Zi, the Founding Heavenly Sovereign of the Supreme Origin, and the Supreme Vastness of the Primordial Yin-Congealed Heaven. May you deign to descend and witness my sincere heart."*
Bow twice again.

Face the Southwestern Earthly Sovereign, bow twice, and kneel.
*"The humble adept, the minor perfected [Name], now bathed and purified, summons the true and invokes the numinous. With this modest offering, I reverently invite the Three Origins of the Pure Void Jade-Heaven, the Celestial Stem Jia-Shen, the Founding Earthly Sovereign, and the Southern Harmony King of the Great Non-Flourishing. May you deign to descend and witness my sincere heart."*
Bow twice again.

Face the Northeastern Human Sovereign, bow twice, and kneel.
*"The humble adept, the minor perfected [Name], now bathed and purified, summons the true and invokes the numinous. With this modest offering, I reverently invite the Seven Subtleties of the Vast Profound Void-Heaven, the Celestial Stem Jia-Yin, the Founding Human Sovereign, and the Supreme Non-Flourishing Prosperity of the Southern Elixir. May you deign to descend and witness my sincere heart."*
Bow twice again.

Next, pour wine toward the Heavenly Sovereign, bow twice, and kneel.
*"The humble adept, the minor perfected [Name], now respectfully addresses the Heavenly Sovereign and the Supreme Vastness of the Primordial Yin-Congealed Heaven. For the matter of [state purpose], I humbly present this modest offering, praying that you partake to satiety. Bestow your salvific protection, that I may receive your grace and blessings. Above, I pray for the emperor’s health and the kingdom’s peace; below, I pray for my own boundless fortune and prosperity."*
Kowtow thirty-nine times, then bow twice again.

Face the Southwestern Earthly Sovereign, bow twice, and kneel.
*"The humble adept, the minor perfected [Name], now respectfully addresses the Earthly Sovereign and the Southern Harmony King of the Great Non-Flourishing. For the matter of [state purpose], I humbly present this modest offering, praying that you partake to satiety. Bestow your salvific protection, that I may receive your grace and blessings. Above, I pray for the emperor’s health and the kingdom’s peace; below, I pray for my own boundless fortune and prosperity."*
Kowtow thirty-nine times, then bow again.

Face the Northeastern Human Sovereign, bow twice, and kneel.
*"The humble adept, the minor perfected [Name], now respectfully addresses the Human Sovereign and the Supreme Non-Flourishing Prosperity of the Southern Elixir. For the matter of [state purpose], I humbly present this modest offering, praying that you partake to satiety. Bestow your salvific protection, that I may receive your grace and blessings. Above, I pray for the emperor’s health and the kingdom’s peace; below, I pray for my own boundless fortune and prosperity."*
Kowtow thirty-nine times, then bow twice again.

Pour wine toward the Heavenly Sovereign, bow twice, and kneel.
*"The humble adept, the minor perfected [Name], now respectfully addresses the Heavenly Sovereign and the Supreme Vastness of the Primordial Yin-Congealed Heaven. Having labored your divine presence to witness this modest offering, I beseech your grace and blessings, that my wishes may be fulfilled. I dare not detain you further; I bow again to bid you farewell."*

Face the Earthly Sovereign, bow, and kneel.
*"The humble adept, the minor perfected [Name], now respectfully addresses the Earthly Sovereign and the Southern Harmony King of the Great Non-Flourishing. Having labored your divine presence to witness this modest offering, I beseech your grace and blessings, that my wishes may be fulfilled. I dare not detain you further; I bow again to bid you farewell."*

Face the Human Sovereign, bow, and kneel.
*"The humble adept, the minor perfected [Name], now respectfully addresses the Human Sovereign and the Supreme Non-Flourishing Prosperity of the Southern Elixir. Having labored your divine presence to witness this modest offering, I beseech your grace and blessings, that my wishes may be fulfilled. I dare not detain you further; I bow again to bid you farewell."*

Next, burn incense, strike the teeth twenty-four times, and recite the incantation:
*"Maiden of the incense smoke, ascend and report to the August Lord. The humble Daoist adept [Name], purified in fast and free of worldly dust, awaits the numinous union of the Five Perfections. May my highest aspirations be fulfilled, calamities extinguished, blessings born, and may I ascend with the Three Heavens."*

Upon completion of the incantation, clear the trays and dismantle the seating.
*Ritual for Transmission of the Registers*

**Altar Construction**

The altar shall be three *zhang* square, its height adjusted according to the practitioner. Open three gates: the Gate of the Heavenly Sovereign in the *zi* (north) direction, the Gate of the Earthly Sovereign in the *shen* (southwest) direction, and the Gate of the Human Sovereign in the *yin* (northeast) direction, each marked with an inscribed placard. The size may also be adjusted according to the number of participants. Encircle the altar with railings and lamps, arranged as deemed appropriate. Entry and exit shall be made through the Gate of the Human Sovereign. If the ritual texts are to be exposed and wind or rain arises, the transmission may be conducted indoors.

For the seat of the Heavenly Sovereign, use eighteen bolts of black silk. For the Earthly Sovereign, eighteen bolts of white silk. For the Human Sovereign, eighteen bolts of blue silk. The silk for the adept’s life-destiny shall correspond to their years: the Son of Heaven shall use bolts, nobles shall use *zhang*, and commoners shall use *chi*. The Son of Heaven shall use purple damask; others shall use plain silk, its color varying by direction, all placed upon the table of the Human Sovereign. Three golden dragons shall be used; commoners may substitute rings. Three blue silk banners, each three *chi* in length, shall be inscribed with the inner texts of the Three Sovereigns in vermilion, fashioned according to banner custom. Bamboo poles, ten *chi* in length, shall suspend them at the positions of the Three Sovereigns. Three sets of tables, incense, and lamps shall be arranged to hold the dragons, silks, and other items, as well as the scriptures of the Three Sovereigns.

The aforementioned altar and its furnishings shall be employed for all rites conducted for the state and the people, for averting great disasters and severe calamities, for seeking grace and invoking blessings, for performing the Dao and transmitting the registers. The recipient of the scriptures shall offer four hundred *chi* of white silk; the poor shall offer forty *chi*. Upon completion of the ritual, master and disciple shall exit the altar, strike the teeth twenty-four times, and recite the incantation:

*"Maiden of the incense smoke, ascend and report to the August Lord. The humble Daoist adept [Name], purified in fast and free of worldly dust, awaits the numinous union of the Five Perfections. May my highest aspirations be fulfilled, calamities extinguished, blessings born, and may I ascend with the Three Heavens."*

Then, facing north, bow twice and invoke:
*"Primordial Void of the Three Mysteries, Celestial Stem *Jia-Zi*, Founding Heavenly Sovereign of the Supreme Flourishing Prosperity, Supreme Radiance of the Congealed Yin of the Grand Brilliance."*

Next, facing southwest, bow twice and invoke:
*"Three Primordials of the Pure Void, Jade Heaven of the Celestial Stem *Jia-Shen*, Founding Earthly Sovereign of the Southern Harmony and Grand Non-Flourishing."*

Then, facing northeast, bow twice and invoke:
*"Seven Subtleties of the Vast Expanse, Void Heaven of the Celestial Stem *Jia-Yin*, Founding Human Sovereign of the Supreme Non-Flourishing Prosperity of the Southern Elixir."*

Next, unfurl the first two *chi* of the received scripture and the covenant text upon the table, and bow twice together. The disciple shall prostrate facing south, while the master kneels facing north. The humble Daoist adept [Name] respectfully addresses the Supreme Primordial Lady, the Great Divinities of the Immortal Capital, and the Three Sovereigns:

*"I now seek to transmit the precious texts of the Three Sovereigns to [Name] of [Commandery, County, Village]. I await your decree to know if this may proceed."*

Then prostrate for a time. When the wind ceases, rise and bow twice. The disciple shall prostrate again, while the master kneels to read the covenant text. Together, they sip the cinnabar water and jointly inscribe a vermilion mark beneath the covenant. The disciple shall then hold the offering and prostrate. The master, holding the scripture and kneeling, shall strike the teeth twenty-four times, visualizing within the Three Palaces a true person each, like an infant, unclothed, their mouths emitting purple *qi* to suffuse the scripture. Slowly, the master shall recite the incantation:

*"The celestial texts of the Supreme,
Transmitted since the dawn of heaven and earth,
Proclaimed by the Sovereigns as the profound decree,
Are the scriptures of the utmost perfection.
Now received by the worthy,
With the aspiration to ascend to the Great Void."*

Upon completion, the disciple shall bow twice and place the offering beneath the table. The transmission of the scriptures concluded, both shall bow twice again. Then, chant the three *Yang Songs*, circling the altar once.

**Yang Song of the Clear Horn**
The *Yang* chant, like a drifting *fàn*,
Resonates through the ten directions.
A myriad verdant blossoms gleam,
Bearing me to the ninefold heights.
The western string ascends in tune,
Awakening the Lord of the Eastern Marchmount.
The Primordial Cavern inaugurates the course,
As the first *yang* sprouts ten thousand buds.
The harmonious wind stirs the jade branches,
The lofty groves gleam with cloudy veils.
*Gou Mang* urges the farmer’s toil,
Sun and moon illumine the eastern expanse.
Immortal sages wander the Mystic Garden,
Soaring *fàn* arise with the cry of pipes.
Grasping the light within the chambers of the grand auroras,
We align our wheels with the nine heavens’ courts.
The host of immortals lifts their flying *fàn*,
The *Yang* song resounds in its season.
Were one not of the spirit’s myriad,
How could one uphold the rites of transformation’s purity?

Next, return to the Heavenly Palace, face north, bow twice, kneel, and strike the teeth thirty-six times. The humble Daoist adept [Name] respectfully addresses the Supreme Lord of the Nine Heavens, the Supreme Elder, the Nine Elders and Great Divinities of the Immortal Capital, the Elder of the Nine *Qi*, the Three Sovereigns, the Eight August Lords, the Great Mystic Divinities of the Dark Capital, the Divine Officials of the Thirty-Six Celestial Offices, the Lords of the Seven Stars of the Jade Armillary and the Shaking Light, the Heavenly Honored Ones of the Purple Palace of the Three Terraces and the Northern Culmen, the Lords of the Heavenly One and the Great One, the Supreme Numinous of the Canopy of the Grand Tenuity, the Divine Officials within and without the Twenty-Eight Constellations, the Five Marchmounts, Eight Mountains, Four Watercourses, Nine Springs, Grotto-Heavens, Sunlit Terraces, Divine Continent, Sacred Isles, Grand Marshes, and Inner Palaces of the Queen of the Waters, the Nine Heavens, Nine Earths, and the Boundless Worlds—all divine beings:

*"Together with [Name], we have performed the fast and conducted the Dao, completing the transmission of the registers. We beseech the assembled divinities to witness our ritual site and diligently guard and assist. Now that the rites are concluded, may each return to your celestial stations, be elevated in rank and imperial order, and receive rewards according to your merits. We respectfully submit this entreaty."*

Then bow twice again. Next, recite the incantation:

The Incense Smoke Maiden, ascending to report to the August Lord, the Lesser Portent Perfected [Name], having purified the fast and severed worldly dust, awaits the numinous Five Penetrations. May the highest aspiration be fulfilled in perfection, calamities extinguished, blessings engendered, and ascent achieved to the Three Heavens.

Next, chant one *Yang Song* and depart:
*The pure horn’s Yang Song, a Brahman chant,
Drifting, stirring the ten directions.
Verdant, myriad blossoms gleam,
Bearing me to the Ninefold Heights.
The western string lifts its tune,
Moving the Lord of the East to awakening.*

Face north and burn incense, strike the teeth twenty-four times, and recite the incantation:
*The Incense Smoke Maiden, ascending to report to the August Lord, the Lesser Portent Perfected [Name], having purified the fast and severed worldly dust, awaits the numinous Five Penetrations. May the highest aspiration be fulfilled in perfection, calamities extinguished, blessings engendered, and ascent achieved to the Three Heavens.*

Next, face the Heavenly August and prostrate twice in long obeisance.
The Lesser Portent Perfected, your subject [Name], respectfully approaches the Primordial Three Mysteries of the Void Heaven, the Celestial Stem *Jiazi*’s Origin-Building Heavenly August Perfected Lord, and the Grand Radiance’s Primordial Yin-Congealing Heaven. Now, for such-and-such matter, having bathed in purity, I summon the Perfected and invoke the numinous. May the highest aspiration grant the emperor robust health and the realm tranquility; may the lowest plea bestow upon me boundless fortune and blessings, and liberate the seven generations of my parents from transgressions and karmic entanglements. I beseech the August Lord to deign to cast his divine gaze downward and scrutinize my sincere heart.

Kowtow thirty-nine times, then prostrate twice again.

Next, face the northeast toward the August of Humanity and prostrate twice in long obeisance.
The Lesser Portent Perfected, your subject [Name], respectfully approaches the Seven Subtleties’ Vast and Profound Void Heaven, the Celestial Stem *Jiayin*’s Origin-Building August of Humanity Perfected Lord, and the Supreme Non-Existent’s Flourishing Son of the Southern Cinnabar. Now, for such-and-such matter, having bathed in purity, I summon the Perfected and invoke the numinous. May the highest aspiration grant the emperor robust health and the realm tranquility; may the lowest plea bestow upon me boundless fortune and blessings, and liberate the seven generations of my parents from transgressions and karmic entanglements. I beseech the August Lord to deign to cast his divine gaze downward and scrutinize my sincere heart.

Kowtow thirty-nine times, then prostrate twice again.

Face north, prostrate twice in long obeisance, and strike the teeth thirty-six times.
The Lesser Portent Perfected, your subject [Name], respectfully addresses the Most High Lord of the Dao of the Nine Heavens, the Most High Venerable, the Great Gods of the Nine Elders’ Immortal Capital, the Nine *Qi* Venerable, the Three August Ones Perfected Lords, the Eight August Honored Lords, the Immortal Officials of the Mysterious Capital, the Great Mysterious Perfected Spirits, the Divine Lords of the Thirty-Six Heavens’ Numinous Offices, the Seven Stars of the Jade Armillary’s Handle-Shaking Lord, the Three Terraces and Purple Palace’s Northern Culmen Heavenly Honored One, the Heavenly One and Grand One Lords, the Supreme Subtlety’s Mysterious Spirit and Canopy’s Upper Numinous Ones, the divine officials within and without the Twenty-Eight Constellations, the Five Marchmounts, Eight Mountains, Four Watercourses, Nine Springs, Grotto-Heavens, Sunlit Terraces, Divine Continent, Sacred Isles, Grand Marshes, Inner Palaces of the Queen of the Waters, the Nine Heavens, Nine Earths, and the Boundless Worlds—all divine beings.

Having purified the fast and cleansed myself, I await the August Perfected’s numinous presence, repenting and confessing my transgressions. May the evil roots and karmic adversaries from the nine generations of ancestors be absolved and dissolved. May the Three Officials report to the Northern Emperor, the red tablets be erased, tribulations be overcome, and peace and tranquility be secured. May the people bear the primordial blessings and receive the emperor’s grace.

Conclude with thirty-nine kowtows, then prostrate twice again.

Next, burn incense, strike the teeth twenty-four times, and recite the incantation:
*The Incense Smoke Maiden, ascending to report to the August Lord, the Lesser Portent Perfected [Name], having purified the fast and severed worldly dust, awaits the numinous Five Penetrations. May the highest aspiration be fulfilled in perfection, calamities extinguished, blessings engendered, and ascent achieved to the Three Heavens.*

Next, chant one *Yang Song* and depart:
*The pure horn’s Yang Song, a Brahman chant,
Drifting, stirring the ten directions.
Verdant, myriad blossoms gleam,
Bearing me to the Ninefold Heights.*

The verdant myriad blossoms gleam,
Bearing me to the Ninefold Heights.
The western zither’s lofty melody,
Moves and awakens the Eastern King of Lords.

The *Dongshen* method of the Three Sovereigns,
Enables communion with spirits, commands myriad gods,
Brings peace to nation and household, aids and delivers the people.
Those who study and cultivate it may ascend as immortals and transcend the world.

Yet since the time of the former masters, the scriptures have not been complete,
And even the transmission of ordination has often been deficient.
Now, in accordance with the scriptures, talismanic charts and jade texts are compiled,
To be conferred upon the altar as treasures for the body.

Among these scriptures, most pertain to methods of summoning,
For they are the discourses of jade texts—rarely employed in the world.
Thus, they may be excerpted and collected hereafter to achieve completeness.
Many learners are impoverished and cannot readily prepare all at once;
Those who can fully ascend the altar are most aligned with the method.

The *Taishang Dongshen* Rite of Dao Transmission and Ordination is now complete.

**The Supreme Cavern Divine Rite of Dao-Walking for Ordination and Empowerment**

**Title:** *The Supreme Cavern Divine Rite of Dao-Walking for Ordination and Empowerment*
**Author:** Unknown, approximately dated to the Northern and Southern Dynasties period. Compiled as a collection of five *Cavern Divine* and *Three Sovereigns* fast rituals. One fascicle.
**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Orthodox Tradition*, Section Zhengyi, Part One.

---

### **The Rite of Evening Petition (宿启法)**
Face north, bow twice, and kneel. Strike the teeth thirty-six times.

The humble Daoist adept, the minor servant [Name], respectfully petitions the Most High Dao Lord of the Nine Heavens, the Supreme Elder, the Great Gods of the Nine Elders’ Immortal Capital, the Nine Qi Elders, the True Lords of the Three Sovereigns, the Venerable Lords of the Eight Emperors, the Immortal Officials of the Mysterious Capital, the Supreme Mysterious True Spirits, the Divine Lords of the Thirty-Six Heavenly Offices, the Lords of the Seven Stars of the Jade Armillary Sphere and the Radiant Light, the Celestial Worthies of the Three Terraces and the Purple Palace of the Northern Pole, the Lords of Heavenly Unity and Supreme Unity, the Mysterious Spirits of the Supreme Subtlety and the Canopy of Flowering Brilliance, the Divine Officials within and beyond the Twenty-Eight Constellations, the Spirits of the Five Peaks, Eight Mountains, Four Waterways, Nine Springs, Cavern Heavens, Sunlit Terraces, Divine Continent, Thunderous Waters, Great Marshes, the Inner Palaces of the Queen of Heaven, the Nine Heavens, Nine Earths, and the Boundless Worlds—all myriad spirits.

Now, in the course of this reverent ritual, I humbly present this evening petition. May all the spirits deign to witness, descend, and safeguard this rite. May they dispel calamities and bestow blessings.

With utmost purity and self-discipline, I await the advent of the numinous and august perfected ones. I repent and seek absolution for the transgressions and malevolent karmic roots of my nine generations of ancestors, praying for their remission and liberation from retribution. May the Three Officials report to the Northern Emperor, erase my name from the Scarlet Register, transcend my tribulations, and secure peace. May I bear the boundless blessings of the primordial and receive the grace of the Emperor.

Upon completion, kowtow thirty-nine times, then bow twice again.

---

### **The Rite of Merit Report (言功法)**
Face north, bow twice, kneel, and strike the teeth six times.

The humble Daoist adept, the minor servant [Name], respectfully petitions the Most High Dao Lord of the Nine Heavens, the Supreme Elder, the Great Gods of the Nine Elders’ Immortal Capital, the Nine Qi Elders, the True Lords of the Three Sovereigns, the Venerable Lords of the Eight Emperors, the Immortal Officials of the Mysterious Capital, the Supreme Mysterious True Spirits, the Divine Lords of the Thirty-Six Heavenly Offices, the Lords of the Seven Stars of the Jade Armillary Sphere and the Radiant Light, the Celestial Worthies of the Three Terraces and the Purple Palace of the Northern Pole, the Lords of Heavenly Unity and Supreme Unity, the Mysterious Spirits of the Supreme Subtlety and the Canopy of Flowering Brilliance, the Divine Officials within and beyond the Twenty-Eight Constellations, the Spirits of the Five Peaks, Eight Mountains, Four Waterways, Nine Springs, Cavern Heavens, Sunlit Terraces, Divine Continent, Thunderous Waters, Great Marshes, the Inner Palaces of the Queen of Heaven, the Nine Heavens, Nine Earths, and the Boundless Worlds—all myriad hosts.

On behalf of [Name] for the matter of [specific purpose], I have conducted this rite of Dao-walking. May the assembled spirits deign to witness this fast, oversee the labor of this rite, and now that the affairs are concluded, return to your palaces to receive rewards according to your merits.

I repent and seek absolution for the transgressions and malevolent karmic roots of my nine generations of ancestors, praying for their remission and liberation from retribution. May the Three Officials report to the Northern Emperor, erase my name from the Scarlet Register, transcend my tribulations, and secure peace. May I bear the boundless blessings of the primordial and receive the grace of the Emperor.

Upon completion, kowtow thirty-nine times, then bow twice again.

---

### **Incense Offering**
Next, burn incense, strike the teeth twenty-four times, and recite the incantation:
*"Maiden of the incense smoke, ascend and report to the August Lord. The humble Daoist adept [Name], purified in fast and free of worldly dust, awaits the numinous union of the Five Perfections. May my highest aspirations be fulfilled, calamities extinguished, blessings born, and may I ascend with the Three Perfected."*

Then chant the *"Yang Song"* once, circumambulate once, and depart.

*"The pure tones of the Yang Song resound,
Drifting and stirring the ten directions."*

chunks.original_text: 立坛式 坛方三丈，高下随人。 开三门，天皇门在子，地皇门在申，人皇门在寅，各施榜题之。 亦可随人多少大小作之。 栏纂灯火，以意消息。 出入当从人皇门行，若露文讫，遇风雨，可於室中度事。 天皇镇坐，彩用皂缯一十八。 地皇镇坐，彩用白缯一十八。 人皇镇坐，彩用青缯一十八。 本命彩随年数，天子用疋数，王公用丈数，庶民用尺数。 天子用紫纹，自他用缦，随方色，悉置人皇案上。 金龙三枚，庶民用环。 青缯旛三枚，各长三尺。 朱书三皇内文於其上，令如旛法。 竹竿长一丈，悬之於三皇之位。 几案香火三具，以安龙彩等物及三皇经。 前件坛中所须，通为国为民，大灾重厄，求恩请福，行道授度，悉用如此施置。 受经者信用白绢四百尺，贫者四十尺。 行道毕，师徒外坛，叩齿二十四通，咒曰： 香烟之女，上白皇君，小兆真人某，清斋绝尘，期灵五通，上愿成真，灭祸生福，上升三天。 次向北再拜呼： 太元三玄空天甲子元建天皇真君、太皓元阴凝天。 次向西南再拜呼： 三元素虚玉天甲申元建地皇真君、南和王太非隆。 次向东北再拜呼： 七微浩郁虚天甲寅元建人皇真君、上非昌子南丹。 次以所受经首二尺，及盟文舒之於案上，俱再拜。 弟子南向伏，师北向长跪。 具位小兆真人臣某，上启太上元君、仙都大神，三皇真君，今欲授某郡县乡里某三皇宝文，未知可否，伏须告命。 便伏一时，须无风，便起再拜。 弟子又伏，师长跪读盟文讫，共噏丹水，朱笔共画一於盟文之下。 讫，弟子持信伏。 师执经跪，叩齿二十四通，心存三宫各一真人，如婴儿之状，不着衣，口吐紫炁以熏经。 徐而咒曰： 太上之天文，传说天地初，皇人宣玄旨，是为至真书。 贤者今奉受，志愿升太虚。 毕，弟子再拜，置信案下。 受经毕，又各再拜。 次咏阳歌三首，巡行一周。 清角阳歌梵，飘飘激十方。 青青万卉曜，携我造九重。 西弦抗音调，感悟东王公。 元洞启运首，始阳萌万芽。 和风振琼条，高林曜云罗。 勾芒劝农业，日月焕东遐。 仙贤游玄圃，飞梵起鸣笳。 控景太霞室，齐轮九天庭。 众仙抗飞梵，阳歌时时鸣。 自非灵人亿，焉能礼化贞。 次还天宫，北向再拜，长跪叩齿三十六通。 具位小兆真人臣某，上启九天太上道君、太上丈人、九老仙都大神、九炁丈人，三皇真君、八帝尊君、玄都仙官太玄真神、三十六天灵司官君、璇玑玉衡七星摇光君、三台紫宫北极天尊、天一太一君、太微玄神华盖上灵、二十八宿中外灵官、五岳八山四渎九源洞天阳台神州仙府震水大泽天后内宫九天九地无极世界一切众神。 谨与某等对斋行道，授度事讫，所请众神鉴临斋所，管卫勤劳。 今既事毕，愿各复诸天位，加品帝秩，随功受赏，谨上启闻。 便再拜。 次咒曰：

**Altar Construction**

The altar shall be three *zhang* square, its height adjusted according to the practitioner. Open three gates: the Gate of the Heavenly Sovereign in the *zi* (north) direction, the Gate of the Earthly Sovereign in the *shen* (southwest) direction, and the Gate of the Human Sovereign in the *yin* (northeast) direction, each marked with an inscribed placard. The size may also be adjusted according to the number of participants. Encircle the altar with railings and lamps, arranged as deemed appropriate. Entry and exit shall be made through the Gate of the Human Sovereign. If the ritual texts are to be exposed and wind or rain arises, the transmission may be conducted indoors.

For the seat of the Heavenly Sovereign, use eighteen bolts of black silk. For the Earthly Sovereign, eighteen bolts of white silk. For the Human Sovereign, eighteen bolts of blue silk. The silk for the adept’s life-destiny shall correspond to their years: the Son of Heaven shall use bolts, nobles shall use *zhang*, and commoners shall use *chi*. The Son of Heaven shall use purple damask; others shall use plain silk, its color varying by direction, all placed upon the table of the Human Sovereign. Three golden dragons shall be used; commoners may substitute rings. Three blue silk banners, each three *chi* in length, shall be inscribed with the inner texts of the Three Sovereigns in vermilion, fashioned according to banner custom. Bamboo poles, ten *chi* in length, shall suspend them at the positions of the Three Sovereigns. Three sets of tables, incense, and lamps shall be arranged to hold the dragons, silks, and other items, as well as the scriptures of the Three Sovereigns.

The aforementioned altar and its furnishings shall be employed for all rites conducted for the state and the people, for averting great disasters and severe calamities, for seeking grace and invoking blessings, for performing the Dao and transmitting the registers. The recipient of the scriptures shall offer four hundred *chi* of white silk; the poor shall offer forty *chi*. Upon completion of the ritual, master and disciple shall exit the altar, strike the teeth twenty-four times, and recite the incantation:

*"Maiden of the incense smoke, ascend and report to the August Lord. The humble Daoist adept [Name], purified in fast and free of worldly dust, awaits the numinous union of the Five Perfections. May my highest aspirations be fulfilled, calamities extinguished, blessings born, and may I ascend with the Three Heavens."*

Then, facing north, bow twice and invoke:
*"Primordial Void of the Three Mysteries, Celestial Stem *Jia-Zi*, Founding Heavenly Sovereign of the Supreme Flourishing Prosperity, Supreme Radiance of the Congealed Yin of the Grand Brilliance."*

Next, facing southwest, bow twice and invoke:
*"Three Primordials of the Pure Void, Jade Heaven of the Celestial Stem *Jia-Shen*, Founding Earthly Sovereign of the Southern Harmony and Grand Non-Flourishing."*

Then, facing northeast, bow twice and invoke:
*"Seven Subtleties of the Vast Expanse, Void Heaven of the Celestial Stem *Jia-Yin*, Founding Human Sovereign of the Supreme Non-Flourishing Prosperity of the Southern Elixir."*

Next, unfurl the first two *chi* of the received scripture and the covenant text upon the table, and bow twice together. The disciple shall prostrate facing south, while the master kneels facing north. The humble Daoist adept [Name] respectfully addresses the Supreme Primordial Lady, the Great Divinities of the Immortal Capital, and the Three Sovereigns:

Together, they sip the cinnabar water and jointly inscribe a vermilion mark beneath the covenant. The disciple shall then hold the offering and prostrate. The master, holding the scripture and kneeling, shall strike the teeth twenty-four times, visualizing within the Three Palaces a true person each, like an infant, unclothed, their mouths emitting purple *qi* to suffuse the scripture. Slowly, the master shall recite the incantation:

*"The celestial texts of the Supreme,
Transmitted since the dawn of heaven and earth,
Proclaimed by the Sovereigns as the profound decree,
Are the scriptures of the utmost perfection.
Now received by the worthy,
With the aspiration to ascend to the Great Void."*

Upon completion, the disciple shall bow twice and place the offering beneath the table. The transmission of the scriptures concluded, both shall bow twice again. Then, chant the three *Yang Songs*, circling the altar once.

The *Yang* chant, like a drifting *fàn*,
Resonates through the ten directions.
A myriad verdant blossoms gleam,
Bearing me to the ninefold heights.
The western string ascends in tune,
Awakening the Lord of the Eastern Marchmount.
The Primordial Cavern inaugurates the course,
As the first *yang* sprouts ten thousand buds.
The harmonious wind stirs the jade branches,
The lofty groves gleam with cloudy veils.
*Gou Mang* urges the farmer’s toil,
Sun and moon illumine the eastern expanse.
Immortal sages wander the Mystic Garden,
Soaring *fàn* arise with the cry of pipes.
Grasping the light within the chambers of the grand auroras,
We align our wheels with the nine heavens’ courts.
The host of immortals lifts their flying *fàn*,
The *Yang* song resounds in its season.
Were one not of the spirit’s myriad,
How could one uphold the rites of transformation’s purity?

We beseech the assembled divinities to witness our ritual site and diligently guard and assist. Now that the rites are concluded, may each return to your celestial stations, be elevated in rank and imperial order, and receive rewards according to your merits. We respectfully submit this entreaty."*

The verdant myriad blossoms gleam,
Bearing me to the Ninefold Heights.
The western zither’s lofty melody,
Moves and awakens the Eastern King of Lords.

The *Dongshen* method of the Three Sovereigns,
Enables communion with spirits, commands myriad gods,
Brings peace to nation and household, aids and delivers the people.
Those who study and cultivate it may ascend as immortals and transcend the world.

Yet since the time of the former masters, the scriptures have not been complete,
And even the transmission of ordination has often been deficient.
Now, in accordance with the scriptures, talismanic charts and jade texts are compiled,
To be conferred upon the altar as treasures for the body.

Among these scriptures, most pertain to methods of summoning,
For they are the discourses of jade texts—rarely employed in the world.
Thus, they may be excerpted and collected hereafter to achieve completeness.
Many learners are impoverished and cannot readily prepare all at once;
Those who can fully ascend the altar are most aligned with the method.

The *Taishang Dongshen* Rite of Dao Transmission and Ordination is now complete.
